name: Prometheus
description: Prometheus, thief of fire for humanity, embodies wisdom and rebellion. His name means forethought, and he wields the fire of creation and enlightment.

skills.name: Fetters of Defiance
skills.description: Prometheus enters the [Bound] state, dealing DMG equal to 250% of ATK to surrounding enemies and gaining a shield equal to 30% of max HP. He also deals DMG equal to 100% of his ATK to all enemies in front of him every 2s and is immune to knockdown. The [Bound] state consumes 150 Energy per second.

upgrades.level2: Gains a shield equal to 40% of max HP.
upgrades.level3: Increases Armor and M-RES by 30% for the duration.
upgrades.level4: Gains a shield equal to 50% of max HP.

skills.name: Burden of Guilt
skills.description: Targets the healthiest enemy, absorbing 15% of their current HP (up to 300% of his ATK).

upgrades.level2: Absorbs 18% of current HP (up to 400% of ATK).
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG taken by the target by 10% until the battle ends.
upgrades.level4: Absorbs 25% of current HP (up to 500% of ATK).

skills.name: Theft of Embers
skills.description: Prometheus charges into the nearest enemy, dealing DMG equal to 150% of his ATK and knocking them back 2 meters. When in the [Bound] state, he also deals DMG equal to 150% of his ATK and knocks back all enemies in front of him 2 meters.

upgrades.level3: Hit enemies have their Armor and M-RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

skills.name: Titanâ€™s Resolve
skills.description: Prometheus is always immune to knockback effects (takes knockdown instead) and reduces DMG taken by 10%. He reduces DMG taken by 20% when in the [Bound] state.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG RED to 12.5%, and to 25% when in the [Bound] state.
upgrades.level3: Additionally gains 15% Effect RES. Gains 30% Effect RES when in the [Bound] state.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG RED to 15%, and to 30% when in the [Bound] state.

relic.name: Titan Unbound
relic.description: Upon defeat, Prometheus leaves shackles on the battlefield. Shackles cannot attack or move, but inherit 200% of Prometheus's max HP.

upgrades.level2: The shackles taunt enemies within a 5-meter radius for 3s upon spawning.
upgrades.level3: Shackles inherit 300% of Prometheus's max HP.
upgrades.level4: Shackles inherit 400% of Prometheus's max HP.
